Articles.Content:
What if the Kerbals went to war? Well, there is only one way to find out: going to war. In this series I use military vehicles, I designed for my other series, The Arms Race, and I fight my brother's vehicles in order to see whose designs are better. After capturing the footage, I edit it together, add music and a backstory and make it into a cinematic-ish video. Here is the first episode and I will post more of them when they come out.

Will I get the VIP back to the KSP safely or will my brother destroy him and all my ships? Watch to find out!

Here are the craft files for the tanks and ships and things I use in this series. Try them out if you want (just give me credit if you use them in anything )!

https://www./folder/mvy45hqquvg5a/Craft%20Files
